author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Stuff the pear with the Stilton and place onto a baking sheet. Place in the oven and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the Stilton has melted. Place the cranberry sauce and cream in a small pan over a low heat for 2-3 minutes. To serve, place the baked pear on a serving plate and pour the cranberry sauce over.
ingredients: 1 tbsp cranberry sauce from a jar,  1 tbsp double cream,  1 pear, peeled and cored,  55g/2oz Stilton
